title: Test Scores: Determining Mean and Standard Deviation
question_text:
In a certain year, a test's scores had a mean $µ$ of $18$ and a standard deviation of $6$.
If a simple random sample of $36$ students were chosen, what would be the mean and standard deviation of the sampling distribution from which the sample was taken?
